25 March 2016

New products

3 March 2016

Oil/Gas

Page de structuration, ne pas éditer.
3 March 2016

Know-how

A worldwide renowned player in the field of Oil & Gas drilling and completion

Industrial and technical assets of Ascometal® leads us to be a key partner of OEMs and distributors on an international scale. Our commercial and technical team based in North America, as well as in Europe and Asia region, allows a faster responsiveness to increasingly demanding market expectations. A well designed industrial configuration meeting customer needs and their growingly stringent specifications in terms of mechanical properties, toughness, H2S and/or high temperature service conditions.
  • heat treatment capacity, excellence in process (macro and micro cleanliness), perfect straightness, wide dimension range, dead length and long length, effective control systems ….
  • modern cutting edge heat treatment equipment (austenitization, quenching, tempering, annealing).
A customized offer for Oil & Gas Ascometal® developped over the years, in parallel to the regular AISI compliant grades, innovative steel solutions to meet ever more stringent requirements of parts (pressure, temperature, corrosion) hence increasing their reliability and life expectancy Ascowell® product range. Main applications
  • Bottom Hole Assembly : Drill Collar, Tool Joint, Heavy Weight Drill Pipe …
  • Tooling : Jar, Stabilizer, Reamer, Packer, Mandrel …
  • Completion : Wellhead, Valve …
To optimize its offer Ascometal® works closely with organizations such as API and NACE as well as the OEMs: AGIP, Baker Hughes, Cameron, FMC Technologies, NOV (National Oilwell Varco), Schlumberger, Total, Weatherford...
3 March 2016

Products / typical end uses

Solutions for Drilling and Completion

Ascometal® can supply a wide range of rolled products in the Oil & Gas industry, thanks to its industrial set up. [table id=67 /]
3 March 2016

Finishing and control

Hot rolling
  • Long length, up to 13m*
Heat treatments
  • Quench & Temper: single or double quenching, quenching and stress relieving
  • Annealing: normalizing, stress relieving, isothermal annealing, spheroidized annealing
 
Cold Finishing
  • Peeling
  • Straightening
Control
  • Automatic controls (surface defects, UltrasSound testing, straighteness, dimensions, UT 100%)
  • Hardness
  • Anti-mix
*Above 13m, please enquire
3 March 2016

Standard steels

Standard steels

Ascometal® also offers the usual product range complying with the relevant standards of the Oil & Gas sector :

Grades brochure

Special steels and standard steels

AISI 4130/4130 mod

  • Mechanical characteristics conforming to API 6A in a large dimensional range
  • H2S variant hardness < 22 HRC
  • Good weldability
  • Good micro-cleanliness

AISI 4140

  • Mechanical characteristics conforming to API 7.1 in a large dimensional range
  • H2S variant hardness < 22 HRC
  • Good micro-cleanliness

AISI 4145H mod

  • Godd micro cleanliness conforming to AMS 2301
  • Good machineability, particularly for drilling

AISI 4340

  • A good compromise between strength and toughness
  • Excellent macro-inclusional cleanliness conforming to AMS 2301 (AMS 2304 on request)

AISI 4330V mod

  • Very good strength and toughness
  • Excellent macro-inclusional cleanliness conforming to AMS 2304

EN30B

  • Good toughness at low temperatures
  • Excellent macro-inclusional cleanliness conforming to AMS 2304

AISI 410/420

  • H2S/CO2 corrosion resistance
  • Excellent macro inclusion cleanliness conforming to AMS 2301
  • Mastered δ ferrite content

petro / ac standards

Grades for the OIl & Gas market (as per API 7.1)

In order to meet ever more stringent requirements and increase part reliability and life expectancy Ascometal® developped over the years, innovative steel solutions: the Ascowell® product range for externe conditions, as well as the Jomasco® DB for drill bits  
  • Ascowell® C
  • Ascowell® TJC

3 March 2016

Research and development

For greater equipment reliability, to deal with an ever-harsher environment…

  • A project team dedicated to the Oil/Gas market
  • Proactive: Innovative solutions for our customers
  • Reactive  when faced with specific demands from the contractors
  • Expertise in the field of corrosion
  • High-performance ressources to develop and test new products (characterization tests, fatigue calculation, experimental grade heating furnace, etc.)
  • Partnership with specialized organisations and the contractors
25 March 2016

New products

3 March 2016

Mechanical Engineering

Page de structuration, ne pas éditer.
3 March 2016

Know-how

A cutting edge technical support for specific steel solutions

The Mechanical Engineering market covers a wide variety of end uses, from metal processing (hot forging, seamless tube making…) to the manufacturing of complex machinery and engine components. The diversity and location of players frequently lead to frequent sales via specialized distribution. This complexity calls for a deep and throurough knowledge of end users needs. Thanks to the back up of its R & D center, Ascometal® offers a wide range of products (grades, dimensions, steel making processes, hot and cold finishing, controls…) in line with customers specifications and showing a clear benefit with regards to end product : gains in machinability, gains in case-hardening, possibility to avoid heat treatment further to drop forging… Our technical knowledge and our international commercial coverage allow us to have an open discussion on specifications with OEMs, especially those having a worldwide presence. On top of grades fulfilling standards, Ascometal® offers innovative solutions for specific requirements :
  • Vitac®, Supervitac® : high-performance machining product with proven results
  • Jomasco® : case-hardening steels with optimized Jominy an enhanced quenchability
  • Nitrasco® : nitriding steels, offering even greater abrasion resistance
  • Metasco® : steels allowing heat treatment within the hot forging process (bainitic and AFP steels)
  • Ascoroc® : steels for mining industry
Main mechanical applications: Transmission chains/drivetrain, extrusion, nitriding, machining, gearing, wind power, railways, MTPS (metallurgy, mining and public works equipment), agricultural machinery, seamless tubes, boiler tubes, defense... Typical end parts : Gears, reducers, steering ring gears for wind mills, tool holders, camshafts, printing cylinders, extrusion screws and sleeves, rock breaker, wheels and axles for railways
Among the main customers approvals : CATERPILLAR • DEUTSCHE BAHN • GAMESA • POCLAIN • SEW • SNCF • VESTAS...
3 March 2016

Products / typical end uses

Products and end uses

Main mechanical applications: Transmission chains/drivetrain, extrusion, nitriding, machining, gearing, wind power, railways, Yellow goods (metallurgy, mining and public works equipment), agricultural machinery, seamless tubes, boiler tubes, defense... Typical end parts : Gears, reducers, steering ring gears for wind mills, tool holders, camshafts, printing cylinders, extrusion screws and sleeves, anode holder, rock breaker, wheels and axles for medium to high speed trains...

Steel solutions for the Mechanical Engineering market

Ascometal® supplies a wide size offering of rolled products for the world of mechanical construction thanks to complementing industrial sites. [table id=74 /]
3 March 2016

Finishing and control

Heat treatments
  • Quench & Temper: single or double quenching and stress relieving
  • Annealing: normalizing, stress relieving, soft annealing, Isothermal annealing, spheroidized annealing
 
Cold Finishing
  • Peeling
  • Cutting to length
 
Control
  • Macro and micro cleanliness
  • Ultrasonic testing 100% , straightness, dimensional...
  • Anti-mix
 
3 March 2016

Standard steels

Standard steels

Ascometal® offers the whole product range used for the numerous applications of Mechanical Engineering: a complete range of carbon and alloy steels meeting national and international standards.
  • Through & Surface Hardening steels
  • Case-hardening steels
  • Bearing steels
  • Spring steels
  • Induction hardening steels
  • Steels for fasteners
  • Steels for nitriding, carburizing
  • Tool steels
  • 9% and 13% Chromium steels
    Grades brochure Special steels and standard steels  

meca / ac standards

Non alloy Engineering steel, compliant with European standards: NF EN10083-1 and 2, NF EN 10273, NF EN 10025-2 and 3 and international ones [table id=77 responsive=scroll /] Case-hardening steels: Euronorm 10084 Adapted consistent alloy content analysis to better fit the thermo chemical treatment as well as the in-use conditions. Possibility to optimize alloy content to better withstand machining or forming process (controlled inclusions). Fine grain steel. High inclusion cleanliness grades to improve resistance to fatigue or pitting. [table id=78 responsive=scroll /] Through and Surface hardening steel compliant with Euronorm: 10083-1 – 10083-2 Mechanical Engineering steel for QT. These grades offer good toughness after QT. Good machinability properties can be obtained while optimizing microstructure and inclusion shape. [table id=79 responsive=scroll /] Nitriding steels: Euronorm 10085 / DIN 17211 Grades suitable for nitriding treatment. The presence of nitride forming elements contributes to the creation of a high surface hardness and / or increases the efficient nitriding depth. [table id=80 responsive=scroll /] Hight chromium steel: Euronorm 10216 - 2 [table id=81 responsive=scroll /] Tool steels: ISO 4957 [table id=82 responsive=scroll /] Steels for various uses Euronorm 10273 (material under pressure, heat resistant...) [table id=83 responsive=scroll /]
3 March 2016

Special steels

Customized solution

On top of grades fulfilling standards, Ascometal® offers innovative solutions for specific requirements :
  • Vitac® 3000, Supervitac® : high-performance machining product with proven results
  • Jomasco® : case-hardening steels with optimized Jominy an enhanced
  • Nitrasco® : ever more wear resistant Nitriding steels
  • Metasco® : steels allowing heat treatment within the hot forging process (bainitic and AFP steels)
  • Ascoroc® : steels for the mining industry
